title: Calculating Change in Sea Height 1995 to 2015

content.question: Based on the data in the graph, which of the following represents the approximate rate of change in Arctic sea level from 1995 to 2015?

choices.label: <math alttext="60 millimeters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mn>60</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mrow><mtext>mm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per year
<math alttext="10 millimeters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>mm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per year

<math alttext="7 millimeters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mrow><mn>7</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mrow><mtext>mm</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> per year

<math alttext="3 millimeters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mrow><mn>3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mrow><mtext>mm</mtext></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> per year

content.answer: <math alttext="3 millimeters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mrow><mn>3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mrow><mtext>mm</mtext></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> per year

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
